author: jmason
msg: libspamc: added a 'private' member to struct message, to solve bug 1595 (-B was colliding with -c in terms of usage of struct message fields)

author: felicity
msg: bug 1699: slightly better regex.  ignore actual magic token strings,
not just magic token prefixes.  this leaves more tokens able to be used.

author: felicity
msg: slightly better version for bug 1699.  keeps **No as valid token, but ignores magic token **NO.
